甒字的基本解释

甒
wǔ
古代盛酒的有盖的瓦器，口小，腹大，底小，较深：“君尊瓦甒。”

甒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wǔ］
［《廣韻》文甫切，上麌，微。］
陶制容器，多用以盛酒。

甒字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　甒； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页752第13
【廣韻】文甫切【集韻】【韻會】罔甫切【正韻】罔古切，?音武。【玉篇】盛五升小甖也。【揚子·方言】甖，周魏之閒謂之甒。【禮·禮器】君尊瓦甒。【註】壷大一石，瓦甒五斗。【儀禮·士冠禮】側尊一甒醴。【疏】甒爲酒器，中寬下直，上銳平底。　又【韻補】叶方九切，音否。【晉書·五行志童謠】渹如白坑破，合集持作甒。揚州破換敗，吳興覆瓿甊。甊，樓上聲。見【古音餘。】　【集韻】或作??。

甒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
甒字的起名意思

暂无。

vase
Basic explanation of words
vase
wǔ
The ancient pottery with a lid for holding wine has a small mouth, a big belly, a small bottom, and a deep one: "Jun Zun Wa Zun."
vase
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wǔ］
["Guangyun" Wen Fuqie, Shangzhe, Wei. ]
Earthenware containers are mostly used to hold wine.
vase
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Wa Word Department] 　甒; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 752 13
[Guang Yun] Wen Fu Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Nian Fu Cut [Zheng Yun] The ancient cut,? Yin Wu. 【Jade articles】Sheng Wusheng Xiaoping also. 【Yangtze Dialect】Poppy, Zhou Wei Zhixian called the "Nun". 【Rite·Ritual Vessel】Jun Zun Wa Zun. [Note] One stone is big, and five fights are made. 【Rituals·Shiguan Ceremony】The side respects a scorpion. 【Sparse】The bottle is a wine vessel, with a medium width and a straight bottom, and a sharp top and a flat bottom.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Fang Jiuqie, no sound. [Book of Jin·Five Elements Children's Rhymes], such as a white pit, a collection of holdings. Yangzhou was ruined, and Wu Xing covered the ampoule. Yeah, upstairs. See 【Guyinyu. 】　【Ji Yun】or as ??.
